column1: Sandyman owned and ran the [[Old Mill]] in [[Hobbiton]] around {{SR
column4: The Gaffer]] was not very fond of Sandyman, or his habits of telling tall tales and having quick judgment of others.<ref>{{FR

column1: Some time before the [[War of the Ring]], Sandyman died and passed his mill on to his son [[Ted Sandyman
Possibly the miller at [[Sarehole]] Mill, Warwickshire, England

column2: I never liked the looks of the Young miller, but his father, the Old miller, had a black beard, and he was not named Sandyman.

column1: :He is given the full name Carl Sandyman, and is the mischievous son of the current miller. He hid his father's hammer and nails. [[Bilbo Baggins
column2: Bilbo]] has to retrieve them before the bridge over the Water can be repaired.
